trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Your B2C tenant's name is the domain that you entered during tenant creation, and is displayed on the directory blade in the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Your B2C tenant's name is the domain that you entered during tenant creation, and is displayed on the directory blade in the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: It usually ends with the suffix `.onmicrosoft.com`, for instance, `contosob2c.onmicrosoft.com`.
trans-unit.target: It usually ends with the suffix `.onmicrosoft.com`, for instance, `contosob2c.onmicrosoft.com`.
